attributes.action: Review the priorities and operational structure of NICE - The National Institute for Clinical Excellence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past 18 months NICE have advised the NHS not to pay for drugs to treat Breast Cancer, Alzhemimer's Disease and Wet AMD (Blindness), on the grounds of cost. At the same time they have recommended the provision of drugs to help smokers to quit. This is unacceptable and the Prime Minister should call for an immediate review of the priorities and structure of NICE and, if necessary, abolish the system and replace it with a new one.
